container.title: Color PH Index
container.mission_statement: This wiki is intended for the purpose of indexing color alkalinity and acidity in a parsable format for using in adventure games under a GPL license for educational purposes.

color.color_alkalinity: The color has the lowest level of alkalinity in the family of level eight alkalines in the color acidity spectrum for colors related to blush.
color.color_relationship: This color is derived from blush red and jungle green.
